title: John Oliver promises 'Last Week Tonight' won't be 'all Trump all the time'
text: Still, the early days of the Trump presidency have felt strangely personal for Oliver, who has lived in the United States since joining "The Daily Show" in 2006. With a grim sense of irony, he noted that many of the executive orders issued by Trump were directly tied in one way or another to a segment from "Last Week Tonight."
summary:
Still, the early days of the Trump presidency have felt strangely personal for Oliver, who has lived in the United States since joining "The Daily Show" in 2006.
With a grim sense of irony, he noted that many of the executive orders issued by Trump were directly tied in one way or another to a segment from "Last Week Tonight."
